notes: It is a quite rare butterfly.
history: This creature's data was implemented on [[Updates/7.6|Christmas Update 2005]]. However, its first spawn was added to the game almost six years later, with the [[Updates/9.1|Summer Update 2011]].
name: Butterfly (Yellow)
behaviour: Flies around the room where is locked in.
location: It can be seen in the basement of the [[Mad Mage]] tower in [[Edron]], {{Mapper Coords|130.42|124.121|10|4|text=here}}. It seems to be one of his experiments.
strategy: None, you cannot reach this creature.
